nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental

Class RenderBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental.RenderBuffer

  • public class RenderBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Experimental class, use at your own risk. Renderbuffer data construct for Renderbuffer and Framebuffer objects.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
